title: Service Discovery Under Docker Swarm Mode
description: In this lab, you will explore how Service Discovery functions in Swarm Mode using a WordPress application.

meta.title: Docker Swarm Mode | Service Discovery
meta.description: Discover how Docker Swarm Mode enables service discovery for your WordPress application, with a step-by-step guide to setting up a Swarm cluster.
meta.keywords: Docker, Swarm Mode, Service Discovery, WordPress, Container Orchestration
